name: Hook'd
description:
My submission to the mini-jam UFO, a platformer where you grab hooks to jump higher. But don't get abducted by the UFOs !

The theme is UFO, in the game they will try to abduct you using fishing hooks (cf: Fish as a mechanic limitation).

Run as far as possible !

Assets used:

  • https://deadrevolver.itch.io/pixel-prototype-player-sprites
  • https://www.kenney.nl/
  • https://www.royaltyfree-music.com/
